Define Documentation

#define SIGNAL_BEGIN   SIGUSR1

Program for compute value of f (x) as sum of series from k = 0 to k = N on expression x ^ (2k +1) / (2k +1)! for values ​​of x, uniformly distributed on interval [0; Pi]. It is a child program.
